Notifications
"hola\n salto de linea"
"Hilton Mexico City Reforma"
"Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez"
"Av. Juárez 70, Colonia Centro, Cuauhtémoc,06010 Mexico City, CDMX"
"Av, Viad. Río de la Piedad S/N, Granjas México, 08400 Iztacalco, CDMX"
"Can I attend the meeting and activities of the K-Forum 2020 with my significant other?"

"We have prepared a special agenda of activities for your Significant Other that will run parallel to your attendance to the Forum. Please check the Significant Others tab on the agenda for details.\n\nSignificant Others are welcome to join us for the Cocktail/Dinner on November 14th and for the Luncheon on November 15th. "
"Is there a dress code for attendees?"

"Business Casual.

On November 14th, we recommend bringing a jacket to the Cocktail/ Dinner. 

On November 15th, we recommend that attendees bring an extra pair of comfortable shoes for the morning activities."
"Is there a dress code for Significant Others?"
"Please consider Business Casual for the Cocktail/Dinner and for the Luncheon. \n\nOn November 14th, we recommend bringing a jacket to the Cocktail/ Dinner"
"After Completing the Registration Process, is my Hotel Reservation Confirmed?"
"Your reservation is confirmed if you marked the “Yes” checkbox in the “Do you require a hotel reservation” question in the registration form"
"At what time is the Check-In and the Check-Out at the Hotel?"

"Check-in: 15:00 hrs.

Check-out: 12:00 hrs.*

*If you are departing on November 15th, you should do an early check-out at 7:00 am. If you are attending with your Significant Other, check-out will be extended until 13:00 hours. We’ll provide luggage storage during the event activities as needed."
"Do I have to Pay for my Hotel Stay?"

"Hotel expenses are covered for 3 nights (November 13th – November 15th).\n\nYou are welcome to arrive earlier or depart later. Additional nights are not included. We suggest you check with your company regarding the details or conditions for the payment of additional nights."
"What Services Does my Reservation Include?"

"Your reservation includes:

• Accommodation

• Breakfast

• Wireless High Speed Internet Access

• Fitness room

Meals and Alcoholic beverages-only those provided during the official events. 

Additional nights or services are not included."
"Will the Entire Event be at the Hotel?"

"For the Attendees:

The activities on November 14th will be held at the hotel, except for the Cocktail/Dinner at the end of the day. Transportation will be provided.

The activities on November 15th will be held in an alternative venue. Transportation will be provided.

For the Significant Others:

The activities will be outside the hotel, except for breakfast"
"Where will the Cocktail/Dinner Take Place?"
"Kaluz Museum\n\nAv. Hidalgo 85, Colonia Centro, Mexico City. Transportation will be provided"
"Where will the Luncheon Take Place?"
"The Luncheon will be at a private location. Transportation will be provided."
"Will There be Special Transportation for the Attendees?"

"Transportation from the Airport to the hotel and from the hotel to the Airport, will be managed by each attendee. We recommend to only use Airport-authorized taxicabs, Hotel-authorized taxicabs, or ride-share services such as Uber, Didi or Cabify.

Transportation will be provided: (i) on November 14th from the hotel to the cocktail and back to the hotel; (ii) on November 15th for attendees at 7:30 am from the hotel to the K-Forum alternative venue; and (iii) from the alternative venue to the Luncheon. The hotel lobby will be our meeting point, please arrive on time.

For Significant Others, all the activities within their agenda include transportation. The meeting point will be the hotel lobby."
